text: Eugene N. Borza (3 March 1935 â€“ 5 September 2021) was an American historian and academic. He was the professor emeritus of ancient history at Pennsylvania State University, where he taught from 1964 until 1995. He was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He was president of the Association of Ancient Historians for six years, from 1984 to 1989. Borza died on 5 September 2021 in State College, Pennsylvania at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American historians Category:Academics from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Cleveland
title: Eugene N. Borza
